messages.subject: Mamagathering!
messages.msgSnippet: Hey all - Just dropping you a note to let you know that the very last day of early registration is 4/30!!! That is THIS FRIDAY! There will be no extension this
messages.messageBody:
Hey all -

Just dropping you a note to let you know that the very last day of
early registration is 4/30!!! That is THIS FRIDAY! There will be no
extension this time around. Below is the outline of the price schedule
- and while it is certainly a good deal even after 4/30, it sure would
feel good to save even a few more bucks, wouldn't it? :) Plus,


**Any workshops that have attendance limits will be filled in order of
registration date**

This is very important as we anticipate that some workshops will
definitely be filling up fast. We are gearing up to send the packets
out via snail mail to register for workshops, so get your
registrations in NOW!!!!


MAMAGATHERING 2004 REGISTRATION

Registration fees ($US via paypal or check):

Adults: This includes all adults attending workshops and/or meals - we
are loving the number of partners coming so far!

$42.50 each through April 30th

$55.00 each through July 1st

Kiddos: Regardless of age - if your due date is July 20th or
thereabouts, or if you are undecided about bringing the kids, we will
accept registration for wee ones at a later date as long as you are
registered already.

$8.50 each through April 30th

$10.00 each through July 1st

Costs include:

~ Meals Friday, Saturday, continental breakfast Sunday ~
~ Weekend workshops ~
~ Friday night and Saturday night events ~
~ Kid activities and workshops during adult workshops/events ~
~ Transportation to all events ~
~ Networking with mamas like you! ~

We have a block of rooms reserved at $69/night at the Quality Inn
Downtown Minneapolis. You must book your room by JUNE 4th to be
included in our block - after June 4th ALL rooms are released and do
fill up quickly! Please note the hotel has waived its age policy for
Mamagathering attendees. Per our contact at the hotel, their local
computer system makes note of this - the national registration system
through the 1-800 number, however, may not. Registering by calling the
hotel directly at 612-339-9311 or informing your 1-800 service
representative may be advisable. Click here to link to the hotel's web
site for a map, driving directions and more information!


Can't wait to see you there!!!!

MamaGathering 2004 Board
